Test Name: HCV Antibody with Reflex to HCV RNA, PCR
Purpose: To screen for HCV antibodies and, if positive or equivocal, confirm active hepatitis C infection by detecting HCV RNA via PCR.
Equipment: Centrifuge; Automated immunoassay analyzer (e.g., Architect, Cobas e601, Alinity i); PCR instrument (e.g., Roche Cobas 6800/8800)
